verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father I adore You
Lay my life before You
How I love You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus I adore You
Lay my life before You
How I love You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Spirit I adore You
Lay my life before You
How I love You
